text: Litsea ligustrina is a species of plant in the family Lauraceae. It is native to Kerala and Tamil Nadu in India. ==References== ligustrina Category:Flora of Kerala Category:Flora of Tamil Nadu Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Celestino Fernández-Villar Category:Taxa named by Christian Gottfried Daniel Nees von Esenbeck
title: Litsea ligustrina
